Downloading because I must know if there is a scene where people are actually playing the Milton Bradly game the movie is based on.

Yes, there is a scene where they basically "play" battleship..  the first 15 minutes of the movie is great.. the last 10 minutes is good.. the rest is total shit.  Every 5 seconds is a slow motion scene that RAPIDLY gets on your nerves.  Most likely to cover up the fact there really isnt a plot to speak of.  Then the magically act like a ship thats been dry docked since WWII and is used as a tourist attraction has actual live ammunition aboard it.. and could still fire...  I nearly laughed my ass off.   Common practice in US Military is decommisioned ships are in fact, de-commisioned.  The barrels are fused shut, firing computers removed, etc etc etc.  And it sure as shit would NOT have live ammunition aboard.

Hi All

I'm a newbie so please be gentle :)...Been downloading here (and seeding!) for quite some time now and all I can say is thank god for PB...But why o why do some people continuously complain about V quality when they know its a cam or etc??? or the up-loader provides with 2cd's!...Its hardly the end of the world :)...and its still free?? :)...not to mention the personal time given by these up loaders to provide entertainment to whom I am grateful..A thank you to all the up-loaders( SaM, extremezone, Bone etc etc.

PS...one more thing if I may...This film "Battleship" I found to be quite entertaining as a Sunday afternoon flick...one almost always knows what these type of films will produce in terms of personal entertainment so please Google it etc before downloading and avoid leaving poor feedback in a negative sense... If  reflective films are your thing...why not download them :)

Regards
Michael

Thanks for the upload. BTW, that 1,000# 16" projectile really weighs 2,700# (AP) or 1,900# (HC). It is a pretty hard thing to hold too, so if you had, say, 30 strong sailors, they wouldn't all be able to get close enough to it, to pick it up, much less carry it..Lucky, I guess, that they find live 16" ammo in a ship that has been decommissioned for 20y. Had they used the MO's nuclear equipped Tomahawk cruise missiles the film could have been over much sooner. 

AP- Armor Piercing
HC- High Capacity (high exp)

I can understand that this has nothing to do with the Battleship game and maybe if the movie was called something different, you'd probly think its an alright alien movie. The fact your even talking about the ships weapons in comparison to real life just makes you a douche. Do you always poke holes in movies? I mean wtf people, come on. It was an alright movie, nothing that totally blew my mind, but looking at some of the comments i have to wonder, wtf is wrong with you guys? If your so critical about this type of little shit, you really shouldn't be watching movies FFS

One more thing. Why are you assholes even disputing WW2? It was a joint effort like one of the guys above me said. WORLD WAR. That means ALLIANCES. The allies won the war, not any one nation, although I do gotta give it to the Russians, we could NOT have done it without them. But that goes for any of the nations involved. BTW I am an American, although that may surprise some of you to know. I'm not an ignorant, overly-patriotic douchebag like you make us out to be, even though you do see alot of that on here
